data.title: EMC ECD Documentum D2
data.meta_description: EMC ECD Documentum D2 - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
•Download as PPTX, PDF•

1 like•5,421 views

The document discusses key features of EMC Documentum D2 including working with widgets and workspaces, searching and managing controlled documents, workflows and collaboration tools, PDF and office integration, extensibility options, and the power of configuration capabilities. It provides overviews of widget gallery, space gallery, repository browsing, advanced search, document naming and numbering, workflow configuration, collaboration features, PDF features, extensibility APIs, and distributed configuration capabilities.

EMC ECD Documentum D2
